item.title: NixOS on Hetzner Cloud with deploy-rs
item.description: deploy-rs is a tool developed by Serokell to deploy NixOS machines into a remote server. It allows for “stateless” deployments, such that the machine that applies the configuration doesn’t know the state of the recipient machine.

item.title: Static blog with Hugo and Nix flakes
item.description: By using this blog as an example, I want to show you how you can use nix flakes for your project.

item.title: Into the Nix
item.description: In this post I want to show a very brief introduction to Nix, the language and package manager, and how it can help you to achieve a fully reproducible development environment.
